description: Warns when main context attempts direct file edits - encourages delegation to agents

hooks.command: echo '⚠️ ORCHESTRATOR MODE: Consider using Task tool with an agent for file edits instead of editing directly. If you ARE an agent, proceed with the edit.'
echo '⚠️ ORCHESTRATOR MODE: Consider using Task tool with an agent for file writes instead of writing directly. If you ARE an agent, proceed with the write.'
echo '⚠️ ORCHESTRATOR MODE: Consider using Task tool with an agent for multi-edits instead of editing directly. If you ARE an agent, proceed with the edit.'
